product_name: florence by millsClean Magic Oil-Balancing Face Wash
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganThe florence by mills Clean Magic Oil-Balancing Face Wash is a dewy and creamy face wash that cleanses and refreshes the skin without over-stripping or leaving it feeling tight and dry. This clean face wash is a gentle solution to remove your makeup and clarify your skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsRemoves makeup, dirt, oil, and environmental yuck so you can get back to being your beautiful selfCleanses and rejuvenates when ypur face feel dry and neglectedHelps fight the effects of environmental nasties like smog and pollutionHelps control excess oil so our pores stay baggage-freeKey IngredientsFerulic Acid: A pollution-fighter that protects skin and boosts softnessEllagic Acid: A plant-powered antioxidant that helps skin look bright as a sunny dayOil-Balancing Blend: A magic mix of seaweed, ivy, lemon and sage that keeps oily skin in checkFormulated WithoutParabensSLS and SLES sulfatesAnimal testingAnimal by-productsItem 2554842How To UseTo use as a cleanser: massage onto wet skin, then rinse well.To use as a makeup remover: apply to dry skin and wipe off with a tissue. Be gentle! It's better for your skin!Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, do not rub. Rinse well with water.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Glycol Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Malic Acid, Mandelic Acid, Gallic Acid, Panthenol, Cyanocobalamin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ethylhexylglycerin, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Elettaria Cardamomum Seed Extract. Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Wood Extract, Rose Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Extract, Saponaria Officinalis Leaf/Root Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Nasturtium Officinale Extract, Hedera Helix (Ivy) Leaf Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Extract, Arctium Majus Root Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower/Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Extract, Cananga Odorata Flower Extract, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Glyceryl Stearate,Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Hydroxycitronellal.
how_to_use: To use as a cleanser: massage onto wet skin, then rinse well.To use as a makeup remover: apply to dry skin and wipe off with a tissue. Be gentle! It's better for your skin!Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, do not rub. Rinse well with water.
ingredients: Elettaria Cardamomum Seed Extract. Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Wood Extract

reviews.headline: No Suds, No Bueno
reviews.comments: Product doesn't work, doesn't foam up. Doesn't feel like it cleanses face. Not worth the price or hype. I returned item - Ulta's no hassle returns are a great perk.

reviews.headline: This might be for you‚Ä¶
reviews.comments: ‚Ä¶if you're not big on texture. Rubbing this in feels like just putting water on my face. I feel like I have to use a lot for it to feel like it's doing something. This has a very thin/milky texture even though it looks thicker when I put it in my hand. The scent is cucumber melon which I wasn't expecting. It's not bad just not my preference. I haven't had any skin reactions thankfully and my face does feel clean after use, just not a fan of the feel of the actual product.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Appy cleanser, don't use water first. Thej use makeup eraser wet towel to rinse the residue. My skin is probe to acne and breakouts. It calms my skin. Absolutely amazing product!

reviews.headline: Not what I was expecting üò¢
reviews.comments: now this florence by mills pruduct has great packaging, but the oder is good AT ALL. Then after 2 day of getting it  i started using it for about 3/4 weeks and my face started breaking put in bumps ALL OVER my face. but after 2 days it settled down. ‚ö†Ô∏è do not recommend for dry skin‚ö†Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Like washing your face with Vaseline motor oil and roses
reviews.comments: Has the same effect as hitting your head on a table and screaming it's like therapy in a cheap plastic bottle üòÉ

reviews.headline: I would buy this again but we need bigger packaging
reviews.comments:
-Smells like cucumbers so good in my opinion
-Feels good and hydrating
-Don't have suds 
-Don't have to us a lot

reviews.headline: amazing
reviews.comments: this was the first face wash i ever really used and i was impressed. it smells great and it's very hydrating. the packaging is also super cute.

reviews.headline: Unfortunately not it..
reviews.comments: Though the reviews were spectacular, I find this cleanser to be everything except a cleanser. No suds whatsoever and it left my skin feeling dirty after use. Also as a makeup remover, it was a 0/10 for me. I don't understand the rave unless I was using it wrong, but I followed the directions blindly and was left so disappointed.

reviews.headline: No big deal
reviews.comments: I like the idea of magic oil cleanser but not enough for someone like me who uses alot of water proof makeup. And yes I did BUY this, so I can be honest.

reviews.headline: No big deal
reviews.comments: I like the idea of magic oil cleanser but not enough for someone like me who uses alot of water proof makeup. And yes I did BUY this, so I can be honest.

reviews.headline: No big deal
reviews.comments: I like the idea of magic oil cleanser but not enough for someone like me who uses alot of water proof makeup. And yes I did BUY this, so I can be honest.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: 2nd time purchasing my daughter loves this product

reviews.headline: Wanted to love but‚Ä¶
reviews.comments: I really wanted to love this cleanser. After reading the reviews, I was confident I would but the strong perfume smell is awful. Usually I check the ingredients to make sure there is no scent, but I must have not done my due diligence here. I also felt like I had to use a lot of product to get the same affect I feel with other gentle face wash products.

reviews.headline: Great gentle cleanser
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser. I don't wear makeup, so I can't speak to that, but it is so gentle on my combination skin. I'm not oily after I use it and not stripped either.  It's great. It is a creamy but light consistency. It doesn't really suds up much, but it rinses off clean and leaves my skin feeling super fresh. It has a very light scent, and all the fragrant ingredients are listed if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: I loved this product so much. It helped me with my pimples and it took my makeup off so well!

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS
reviews.comments: Love this cleanser so much!!! It makes my face super smooth and hydrated, this has never broke me put! Its so gentle too! literally love mills for this! And remember a little goes a long way

reviews.headline: good
reviews.comments: its very gentle and cleansing

reviews.headline: love it!!!
reviews.comments: i love this product!!! the only thing is it runs out sorta fast.

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: I have been using this cleanser since millie made her company. it smells super refreshing, very gentle, and is super good for beginners! This product never made me break out or make my face feel dry. 100% recommend!!

reviews.headline: Doesnt deserve total hate..
reviews.comments: I totally understand not everyone has the same skin or will get the same results, as someone who struggles with certain cleansers breaking them out. But for me this product was pretty good. I got it as a christmas gift in a little holiday set/bundle last year. It's not amazing compared to CeraVe or anything like that. But its not awful! Other reviews say it didn't get their makeup off but it did mine...or at least my mascara. I like Millie's toners more to be honest though. They gave more result. This cleanser was eh compared to them. But then again...its not THAT bad. Calm down guys.

faceoff_positive.comments:
First of all, I have been looking for good skincare for teens for many years now that is clean, not many chemicals, and is kind to the skin. This cleanser is perfect for teens as it is gentle, soft, and cruelty-free. This cleanser unlike most I've tried cleans the skin very nicely without stripping the skin of all its natural oils. One of the cons is some people that have sensitive skin are having reactions to the product. I say if you have sensitive skin stay away from this product but if not it is completely amazing! Another thing I would like to add is after using this product for less than 2 weeks, my skin was clear! I used the clean magic cleanser, dreamy dew moisturizer, and the zero chill face mist. The scent completely blew me away when I first tried it because it smelled so refreshing and calm! The face wash wakes me up in the morning and gives me a fresh start to my day. I would not recommend this to adults since Millie specifically made the brand for young teens. The packaging was beautiful and the box it comes in has a cute quote to make you feel confident. 

*BOTTOM LINE*
Great for teens who don't have sensitive skin.
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing skincare for teens

faceoff_negative.comments: This is my first review because I felt so compelled to let others know. I am a beauty product fiend and have tried hundreds of face washes on my quest to clear skin. I am in my early 30's so I was reluctant to begin with as this brand seems geared to younger women but it does say all ages. While it seems gentle and I appreciate a clean cruelty free product (hence the 2 stars), this face wash DOES NOT REMOVE MAKEUP. I thought maybe I didn't use enough so I went for another dollop. Things did not improve with more product. I am shook due to the hype around this line not to mention it's already sold out. As another user stated, I had to use 10 cottons pads soaked in toner and 2 eye makeup remover pads just to get my skin feeling halfway clean and even still I feel like I should re-wash my face with my regular Kiehl's cleanser. Guys, trust me, don't buy this if you wear even an ounce of makeup and want a clean face. If this was marketed as a second step or there were other cleansers in the line it may be a different story, but this is their ONLY face wash, so there's no reason to believe it shouldn't clean-your-face. I will be returning the first chance I get. Super sad as I wanted to love it!
faceoff_negative.headline: This gets a hard no from me.
